Trade/Device Name(s): VITEK® 2 Gram Positive Telithromycin for Streptococcus pneumoniae
VITEK 2 AST-GP Telithromycin for Streptococcus pneumoniae
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK 2 Gram Positive Telithromycin for Streptococcus pneumoniae antimicrobial susceptibility reagent panel used on VITEK 2 instrument platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Streptococcus pneumoniae using VITEK 2 and VITEK 2 Compact Systems as a laboratory aid in the determination of in vitro susceptibility to antimicrobial agents
